hints.text: Analyze uses AI to estimate time, suggest steps, and identify what's done.
2nd opinion sends your task (anonymized) to ChatGPT, Gemini, or Perplexity for review.
Double-click any step to edit it inline.
AI can suggest extracting complex steps into separate tasks.
Your data stays local — only 2nd opinion sends anonymized data externally.
Toggle individual AI suggestions on/off before applying changes.
Focus mode shows CTA, deliverable, and guidance hints for each active step.
Completed tasks generate credible brag entries for performance reviews.
Accept a brag to save it — regenerate anytime for a different phrasing.
Saved brags appear in the Brag List page for easy copy during reviews.
Save good task breakdowns as templates for future reuse.
